name: apply gauges configs
come clonare
info:
seleziona nodi

    export come json

    avranno un aspetto simile a
        {
            "id": "8688db4c9c99cada",               
            "type": "ui_led",       //nodo semplice
            "order": 3,
            "group": "f139ce507b5170da",
            "width": 7,
            "height": 1,
            "label": "emergenza attiva",
            ..stuff..
            "x": 940,
            "y": 420,
            "wires": []
        },
        ..stuff..
        {
            "id": "f139ce507b5170da",
            "type": "ui_group",          //nodo layout dashboard (widjet group)
            "name": "Pressa 2",
            "tab": "533e203349de7f15",
            "order": 2,
            "disp": true,
            "width": 9,
            "collapse": false,
            "className": ""
        },
        {
            "id": "533e203349de7f15",
            "type": "ui_tab",           //nodo layout dashboard (tab)
            "name": "Stato Presse",
            "icon": "dashboard",
            "order": 1,
            "disabled": false,
            "hidden": false
        },
    CON UTILITY
        incolla in payload l'export limitato
        modifica clone utility a piacere (piu info all interno)
        se ricevi errori: esporta l'intero progetto tramite il menu in alto a destra ed incollalo in "full export"    //nota: non tutti i config-nodes vengono inclusi negli export: l'utilty cercher in fullExport quelli mancanti
        
    CON NOTEPAD
        usa find/replace su notepad per:
        - trovare l'id del nuovo gruppo
        - rimpiazzare "group": in tutti i nodi "semplici" con il nuovo id.
        -fare altre eventuali modifiche

name: switch

    return [null,msg]   //to (silenced) catchPlc
else
    return [msg,null]; //to catch all

name: silence timeouts
QueryDB AllProdExc
map dbNames to old s7Names
join
QueryDB AllProdExc
initialize:
let ctxGet = (vName, defVal) => { let tmp; (tmp = context.get(vName)) ?? context.set(vName, defVal); return tmp ?? context.get(vName) }

//mappa di conversione da nomi DB a nomi s7 del progetto quadripressa
    //non serve piu, ma potrebbe tornare utile
let prodPrefix = "prod_";
let _prodMap = ctxGet("prodMap", {
    "CYCLE_NUMBER": "prod_cycleNumber",
    "ORDER_ID": "prod_id",
    "BEGIN_TIME": "prod_startTime",
    "END_TIME": "prod_endTime",
    "QUANT_PROD": "prod_quantProd",
    "ESITO": "prod_esito"
});

//mappa di conversione da nomi DB a nomi s7 del progetto quadripressa
let excPrefix = "exc_";
let _excMap = ctxGet("excMap", {
    "ORDER_ID": "exc_id",
    "STATUS": "exc_status",
    "QUANT_TO_DO": "exc_quantToDo",
    "QUANT_PROD": "exc_quantProd",
});


let _query = ctxGet("query", `
SELECT
  p.CYCLE_NUMBER AS ${_prodMap["CYCLE_NUMBER"]},
  p.ORDER_ID AS ${_prodMap["ORDER_ID"]},
  p.BEGIN_TIME AS ${_prodMap["BEGIN_TIME"]},
  p.END_TIME AS ${_prodMap["END_TIME"]},
  p.QUANT_PROD AS ${_prodMap["QUANT_PROD"]},
  p.ESITO AS ${_prodMap["ESITO"]},

  exc.ORDER_ID AS ${_excMap["ORDER_ID"]},
  exc.STATUS AS ${_excMap["STATUS"]},
  exc.QUANT_TO_DO AS ${_excMap["QUANT_TO_DO"]},
  exc.QUANT_PROD AS ${_excMap["QUANT_PROD"]}
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      *
    FROM
      oven.italmatic_production
    WHERE
      CYCLE_NUMBER = (
        SELECT
          MAX(CYCLE_NUMBER)
        FROM
          oven.italmatic_production
      )
  ) AS p
  LEFT JOIN oven.italmatic_exchange AS exc ON exc.ORDER_ID = p.ORDER_ID
`);

/*
SELECT
  p.CYCLE_NUMBER AS prod_CYCLE_NUMBER,
  p.ORDER_ID AS prod_ORDER_ID,
  p.BEGIN_TIME AS prod_BEGIN_TIME,
  p.END_TIME AS prod_END_TIME,
  p.QUANT_PROD AS prod_QUANT_PROD,
  p.ESITO AS prod_ESITO,

  exc.ORDER_ID AS exc_ORDER_ID,
  exc.STATUS AS exc_STATUS,
  exc.QUANT_TO_DO AS exc_QUANT_TO_DO,
  exc.QUANT_PROD AS exc_QUANT_PROD
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      *
    FROM
      oven.italmatic_production
    WHERE
      CYCLE_NUMBER = (
        SELECT
          MAX(CYCLE_NUMBER)
        FROM
          oven.italmatic_production
      )
  ) AS p
  LEFT JOIN oven.italmatic_exchange AS exc ON exc.ORDER_ID = p.ORDER_ID

*/

- this node sets its status to the LAST operation's outcome.
    Meaning it will stay the same unless another query is sent
-mysql errors are thrown as exceptions
-connection state is not shared.

info:
msg are queue in parallel, using timeouts.
rate is also limited, so the actual delay may exceed the timeout by
    rateTime * queueLength, growing without limits if inputs exceed rate.

name: DB PollGet Template
QueryDB cycle(last && incomplete) retry:10t / 2s / 20s
QueryDB exc(orderId list)  retry: 6t / 2s / 30s
to multiQueryData.lastCycleNumber
QueryDB cycle(lastCycleNumber) retry:15t / 2s / 30s
to multiQueryData.cycleRowExists_pollRes
to multiQueryData.cycleRow_pollRes
QueryDB prod(lastCycleNum)  retry:6t / 2s / 30s
to multiQueryData.orderId
to multiQueryData.prodRowList_pollRes
to multiQueryData.excRowList_pollRes
completes when endTime > startTime and close to Date.now()
completes when last cycles's endTime is not set or < startTime
SELECT <many> as <alias> FROM cycle JOINED (1:many) ital_production ON CYCLE_NUMBER JOINED (many:many) ital_exchange ON  ORDER_ID
why not a single sql query? (readMe)
info:
there is no "done" event
the db is therefore polled adopting different strategies to ensure the data has been integrally written

complete: (     /** /$pollCtxKey := "dbPollGet";/**/     /**/$pollCtxKey := $globalContext("db").polledQuery.pollCtxKey; /**/     $pollCtx := $lookup(msg, $pollCtxKey);     $res := msg.payload;     $template := {         "gErr":$pollCtx.sqlErrorList_grouped,         "pollCtx":$pollCtx,         "full":msg          };     /* if/else statement (ternary)         //$merge fails if array members aren't objects */     /* if is array */     $type($res) = "array" ? (         /* if empty */         $count($res) = 0 ? (             $template         ) : (         /* else if single rows */             $count($res) = 1 and $type($res[0]) = "object" ? (                 $merge([$res, $template])         /* else (many rows) */             ) :  $merge([{"res":$res}, $template])         )         /*else (!array) */     ) : $merge([{"res":$res}, $template]) )

name: send global.db

let thisClassName = "db";
return global.get(thisClassName) ?? node.error(`global.${thisClassName} not yet def`);

name: SQL BKP: GRANT PRIVILEGES (per NF119_v1.2.0)
info:
/*
query per assegnare i privilegi sulle tabelle utilizzate.
NON FUNZIONA su dev, perch il db non  su localhost (ma su una vm CITECT separata).
     Sostituisci localhost con % o assegna manualmente i massimi privilegi.
*/

/* parti da 0 */
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES, GRANT OPTION
  FROM 'nodered_client';

/* assegna ampi privilegi a _production, ovvero la tabella su cui
     gli ordini vengono inseriti/aggiornati da CITECT.
     usati(prod):SELECT
     usati(prod+dev):.., INSERT */
GRANT
	DELETE, 
    INSERT, 
    SELECT, 
    SHOW VIEW, 
    UPDATE
ON oven.`italmatic_production`
to 'nodered_client'@`localhost`;

/* assegna ampi privilegi a _production, ovvero la tabella su cui
     gli ordini vengono aggiornati da CITECT ed inseriti/cancellati da NodeRed.
     usati(prod):SELECT, INSERT, DELETE
     usati(prod+dev):.. */
GRANT
	DELETE, 
    INSERT, 
    SELECT, 
    SHOW VIEW, 
    UPDATE
ON oven.`italmatic_exchange`
to 'nodered_client'@`localhost`;

/* assegna minimi privilegi a cycle, ovvero la tabella su cui
     CITECT inserisce ogni ciclo.
     usati(prod):SELECT,
     usati(prod+dev):.., INSERT */
GRANT
    SELECT, 
    SHOW VIEW
ON oven.`cycle`
to 'nodered_client'@`localhost`;

name: Logo / Clock
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        
        var logoContainer = document.createElement("div");
        logoContainer.style.margin = "5px auto";
        //logoContainer.style.marginBottom = "0px";
        
        var imgCont = document.createElement("span");
        imgCont.style.position = "relative";
        imgCont.style.top = "0px";
        logoContainer.append(imgCont);
       
        logoItal = new Image();
        logoItal.src = "/loghi/italmatic/logoItalmatic.png";
        logoItal.height = 33;
        logoContainer.children[0].append(logoItal);



        var imgCont2 = document.createElement("span");
        imgCont2.style.marginLeft="30px";
        imgCont2.style.position = "relative";
        imgCont2.style.top = "5px";
        logoContainer.append(imgCont2);

        logoGiga = new Image();
        logoGiga.src = "/loghi/giga/logoGiga.png";
        logoGiga.height = 45;
        logoContainer.children[1].append(logoGiga);


        //add clock
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div2.append(p);
        div2[0].style.margin = '5px';

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleString());
        }
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(logoContainer);
            toolbar.append(div2);
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>

name: about fallbackGUIVars
info:
fallbackGUIVars holds both the failsafe JSON and some
    handling functions that are always injected into new GUIVars instances
the functions are restored by <root>.inflate( ), as they cannot be stored in 
    a json file.

read global.utils.genericInflater() for more info

name: config page style
format:
<style>
   .machine-config.config-label {
      position:relative;
      top:20px;
      padding-left:5px;
      font-weight:bold;
      
   }

   body {
      --kitten:miao;
   }
   
   /*----- checkbox as animated switch -------
   //@supports (-webkit-appearance: none) or (-moz-appearance: none) { */
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify {
         --active: #275EFE;
         --active-inner: #fff;
         --focus: 2px rgba(39, 94, 254, .3);
         --border: #BBC1E1;
         --border-hover: #275EFE;
         --background: #fff;
         --disabled: #F6F8FF;
         --disabled-inner: #E1E6F9;
         -webkit-appearance: none;
         -moz-appearance: none;
         height: 1.5em;//21px;
         outline: none;
         display: inline-block;
         vertical-align: top;
         position: relative;
         margin: 0;
         cursor: pointer;
         border: 1px solid var(--bc, var(--border));
         background: var(--b, var(--background));
         -webkit-transition: background .3s, border-color .3s, box-shadow .2s;
         transition: background .3s, border-color .3s, box-shadow .2s;
      }
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify:after {
         content: '';
         display: block;
         left: 0;
         top: 0;
         position: absolute;
         -webkit-transition: opacity var(--d-o, 0.2s), -webkit-transform var(--d-t, 0.3s) var(--d-t-e, ease);
         transition: opacity var(--d-o, 0.2s), -webkit-transform var(--d-t, 0.3s) var(--d-t-e, ease);
         transition: transform var(--d-t, 0.3s) var(--d-t-e, ease), opacity var(--d-o, 0.2s);
         transition: transform var(--d-t, 0.3s) var(--d-t-e, ease), opacity var(--d-o, 0.2s), -webkit-transform var(--d-t, 0.3s) var(--d-t-e, ease);
      }
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify:checked {
         --b: var(--active);
         --bc: var(--active);
         --d-o: .3s;
         --d-t: .6s;
         --d-t-e: cubic-bezier(.2, .85, .32, 1.2);
      }
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify:hover:not(:checked):not(:disabled) {
         --bc: var(--border-hover);
      }
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify:focus {
         box-shadow: 0 0 0 var(--focus);
      }
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify + label {
         //font-size: 14px;
         line-height: 1.5em;//21px;
         display: inline-block;
         vertical-align: top;
         cursor: pointer;
         margin-left: 4px;
      }
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify.switch {
         width: 2.8em; //38px;
         border-radius: 11px;
      }
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify.switch:after {
         left: 2px;
         top: 2px;
         border-radius: 50%;
         width: 1em;//15px;
         height: 1em;//15px;
         background: var(--ab, var(--border));
         -webkit-transform: translateX(var(--x, 0));
         transform: translateX(var(--x, 0));
      }
      input[type='checkbox'].switchify.switch:checked {
         --ab: var(--active-inner);
         --x: 17px;
      }
   /*}*/

   .table-button{
      text-align:center;
      vertical-align:middle;
      color:inherit;
      border:none;
      margin: auto auto;
      font-size:130%;
   }
   .adminUI .table-button.delete{ margin-top:-0.2em; }
   .table-button.delete:hover {
      color:skyblue;
   }

   /*------- table select - style 'minimal' ------------*/

   select {
        /* styling */
        background-color: white;
        border: thin solid blue;
        border-radius: 4px;
        display: inline-block;
        font: inherit;
        line-height: 1.5em;
        padding: 0.5em 3.5em 0.5em 1em;

        width:100%; /* fit tabulator cell*/

        /* reset */

        margin: 0;      
        -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
        -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        -webkit-appearance: none;
        -moz-appearance: none;
    }

    select.minimal {
        background-image:
            linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 50%, gray 50%),
            linear-gradient(135deg, gray 50%, transparent 50%),
            linear-gradient(to right, #ccc, #ccc);
        background-position:
            calc(100% - 20px) calc(1em + 2px),
            calc(100% - 15px) calc(1em + 2px),
            calc(100% - 2.5em) 0.5em;
        background-size:
            5px 5px,
            5px 5px,
            1px 1.5em;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
    }

    select.minimal:focus {
        background-image:
            linear-gradient(45deg, green 50%, transparent 50%),
            linear-gradient(135deg, transparent 50%, green 50%),
            linear-gradient(to right, #ccc, #ccc);
        background-position:
            calc(100% - 15px) 1em,
            calc(100% - 20px) 1em,
            calc(100% - 2.5em) 0.5em;
        background-size:
            5px 5px,
            5px 5px,
            1px 1.5em;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        border-color: green;
        outline: 0;
    }


    select:-moz-focusring {
        color: transparent;
        text-shadow: 0 0 0 #000;
    }
        
</style>
